dct_title_s: Riparian map of the Hudson River line along Hudson and Bergen County, New Jersey, and the corresponding New York City shoreline
dct_description_sm: Riparian map and nautical river chart depicting New Jersey and New York shorelines along the Hudson River, Bergen and Hudson Counties. Lines are drawn where the Weehauken and 130 St. ferries commute through the Hudson River
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Latest date found on map is 1906; date is inferred.
